transfer.future.capital.intro.choose: Pick a fund for your future contributions:
transfer.future.capital.no.subtitle: Your pension fund contributions will continue to be directed into  {{currentFundName}} pension fund, with a management fee of {{currentFundManagementFee}}% per year. If you wish to save money on fees, you can direct your contributions to Tuleva at a later date.

confirm.mandate.future.contribution: I wish to transfer future fund payments to:
confirm.mandate.switch.sources: I wish to exchange current fund units for:
confirm.mandate.agree.to.terms: I confirm that I have had the chance to view all fund prospectuses. By clicking “sign“ a digitally signed application will be sent to the register.
confirm.mandate.view.info: web page you can compare the fees and prospectuses of all registered pension funds. Clicking the preview button you can download the application and if you so desire, send it directly to the registry. By clicking sign and send, Tuleva web application will forward the signed application on your behalf to the registry.
confirm.mandate.not.filled.understand: Did we understand you correctly? You do not wish to exchange current pension fund units nor direct future pension fund contributions to Tuleva.
confirm.mandate.not.filled.cheapest: Tuleva has the lowest management fees out of all Estonian pension funds.
confirm.mandate.not.filled.look.again: I'd like to look over my options once more

terms.of.use.title: Agreement
terms.of.use.subheading: By logging into the Tuleva web application you are giving Tuleva Fondid AS permission request information about your pension account from the Estonian Central Securities Depository. Among this information is your:
terms.of.use.list.item.4: pension fund, into which you are currently making contributions
terms.of.use.main.line.1: Based on this data Tuleva Fondid AS will display your pension account statement information, help you make the fund unit exchange application and/or the fund selection application and send the applications to the Estonian Central Securities Depository.
terms.of.use.main.line.2: Tuleva Fondid AS does not save the information received from ECSD, but only registers your log in info (first and last name, personal ID code, login time).
terms.of.use.main.line.3: The person responsible for handling the data for Tuleva Fondid AS is Tõnu Pekk, e-mail: tuleva@tuleva.ee.
terms.of.use.main.line.4: The assumptions behind the Tuleva calculator are defined here.

new.user.flow.intro: See for yourself, why Tuleva is a good choice and become a member.
new.user.flow.why: Tuleva funds have very low management fees. As a member you'd get additional savings due to earning a pension bonus.

comparison.intro: A deceptively small difference in management fees will end up taking up a very big part of your future pension. In Tuleva funds you will pay less fees than in any other pension fund.
comparison.call.to.action: Calculate, how much you can save thanks to Tuleva!
comparison.expected.index.return.tooltip: The default return value offered, is based on the historical returns of one of the largest index funds in the world (BlackRock World Equity Index Fund). As a Tuleva member you of course known that past returns are not a guarantee for the future. You can also test to see what would happen with higher or lower returns.
Our calculator was built by Tuleva members to help you see why fees matter. They have done their best to be correct and use realistic assumptions. For simplicity, we assume no chances in fees though in reality Tuleva fees will definitely drop, hopefully others will reduce fees as well. Let us know if you see any errors, or have any suggestions for improvements!
select.sources.comparison.intro: With Tulevaga you will save thousands of euros on fees.

footnote.comparison.part1: Ülal võrdluses peame panga pensionifondi all silmas fonde, mida valitsevad Swedbanki, SEB Panga, Nordea Panga või LHV Pangaga ühte konsolideerimisgruppi kuuluvad fondivalitsejad. Nendes pensionifondides on sinu raha fondivalitseja äririskide vastu täpselt
footnote.comparison.part3: nagu Tuleva pensionifondides. Samas on nende pensionifondide keskmine valitsemistasu 1,08% (allikas:
footnote.comparison.part5: ) ehk enam kui kolm korda kõrgem Tuleva pensionifondide valitsemistasust (0,34%).
footnote.cheapest: Tuleva pensionifondide valitsemistasu on keskmiselt kolm korda madalam kui panga pensionifondide valitsemistasu (0,34% vs 1,08%). Tuleva pensionifondid on kõigi fondide lõikes soodsamad kui ühegi teise Eesti fondivalitseja juhitud fondid. Siiski on täna veel üle 60-aastastele inimestele mõeldud Swedbank K1 fondi valitsemistasu madalam - 0,29%. Kui sa oled vähemalt 60-aastane, on see fond sulle Tuleva Maailma Võlakirjade Fondi kõrval arvestatav valik.
